value:
$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Scurry, scurry, little Heroes... Steal
for me. Spread destruction. Kill all
those who stand in your way.$k$p$EFace_Anger|This kingdom must fall. Once it's
gone, no one will oppose me.$k$pEvery Hero, in every world—they'll
all be mine. Every last one.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|We won't allow it, Princess Veronica.
And I will personally never forget
this violation of my kingdom!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Oh, it's you. And after I went
through all that trouble to arrange
your playdate.$k$p$EFace_Pain|Now, who are YOU, stranger? You
have that silly relic. Then you must
be the legendary summoner.$k$p$EFace_Anger|No matter. It simply means that
you must be the first to die.
Oh...Xander!$k$p$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You wish this one slain, Princess
Veronica? As you wish.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|No! She has Xander, one of the
most powerful Heroes from
the World of Conquest.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Don't worry. We'll protect you,
$Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Get ready, everyone. Let's show this
rotten princess what the Order of
Heroes can really do!$k$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|$SspVOICE_TUTORIAL_D|To use a unit's Assist Skill, move
the unit onto another one.$k
Assist Skills are used on your allies.

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Left all alone. Again? How dull.
I'll go console myself back home
with a cup of tea.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|That foolish princess is retreating
with her Heroes.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|The battle's won, but this didn't
resolve a thing. The empire will
invade again soon enough.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|$w0|Stubborn girl. Why can't we just
talk through this? These invasions
are crazy.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Honestly, that Veronica needs to
grow up already. Where's her sense
of diplomacy? Such a BRAT!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Sharena, don't let your emotions get
the best of you—not on duty.$k$pI expect you to keep a level head if
you're going to serve in this order.
Hostility is their way, not ours.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Sure, sure... I mean, of course,
Commander Anna.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|$w0|I'm sorry that you've been thrown
into this brutal war with us,
$Nu.$k$p$EFace_Smile|But I'm glad you're here—an official
member of the Order of Heroes!$k$Sbs1000|
